name: places/ChIJv25ipytZwokRjY9_8ehrdAY
formattedAddress: 303 E 91st St, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 303 E 91st St, New York, NY 10128-5301, USA

originalText.text:
My partner Beth and I had never owned a dog until late August when we adopted our beloved 11 lbs Poodle, Chihuahua, Pit Bull mix Poppy. We then interviewed 4 doggy day care centers on the Upper East Side before choosing Up Pup. It is unequivocally the best decision we have made for Poppy.

When we pick up Poppy on our way home from work she is happy and exhausted at the same time which the perfect combination. Also, Joe and Bronwen are brilliant at their craft as well as straight shooters.

Simply put: Up Pup is the best in the business.

originalText.text: Best people on planet earth. My dog likes them more than me. He's always so excited to go. When I pick him up he's happy and tired. The staff is incredible. They are kind and work hard to meet any needs you may have. HIGHLY recommend Up Pup for daycare. I won't send my pup anywhere else.

text.text: Best people on planet earth. My dog likes them more than me. He's always so excited to go. When I pick him up he's happy and tired. The staff is incredible. They are kind and work hard to meet any needs you may have. HIGHLY recommend Up Pup for daycare. I won't send my pup anywhere else.

originalText.text:
Five stars isn’t enough to express my family’s love for Up Pup. As soon as our puppy was old enough to safely go to daycare, we started taking him here. We credit Up Pup with socializing him and teaching him how to properly play with other dogs. He always had the best time there. We always felt so safe and comfortable leaving him in such competent and compassionate hands.
They are also very active on Instagram stories which is amazing so you can watch your pup all day!

The groomer also does amazing work, and was our go-to every time he needed a bath or haircut. We also boarded him here multiple times and always felt comfortable doing so.

We have since moved out of the area, and truly one of the things we miss the most is Up Pup. They are one of a kind professionals who will take care of your dog like they are their own. It really felt like his second home. Even though we no longer live in the area we would drive out of our way to board him here again, they are really that incredible.

originalText.text: We've been sending our dog to Up Pup since he was a puppy and he absolutely LOVES it there. We can't say enough good things about our experience with Up Pup - everyone there is so kind and loving towards all the dogs, the dogs have an absolute BLAST, and get great care. We also get our dog groomed with them and he always comes home looking adorable, and have used their boarding as well and trust them immensely. Up Pup is our dog's second home and we couldn't be happier.

text.text: We've been sending our dog to Up Pup since he was a puppy and he absolutely LOVES it there. We can't say enough good things about our experience with Up Pup - everyone there is so kind and loving towards all the dogs, the dogs have an absolute BLAST, and get great care. We also get our dog groomed with them and he always comes home looking adorable, and have used their boarding as well and trust them immensely. Up Pup is our dog's second home and we couldn't be happier.

originalText.text: I've been sending my doodle Gouda to daycare and grooming at Up Pup for over a year now and am super happy with the care she receives. Her safety and happiness are extremely important to me and I was nervous to leave her with anyone at first, but I had to return to office a few days a week plus some socialization and playtime are good for her. She was nervous the first time but quickly grew to love it. She goes absolutely bonkers when she realizes that's where we're headed, and she never wants to leave when I pick her up. It's been the same staff since I started taking her, so I never feel like I'm handing her over to strangers. They accommodate snack time, which is great on the days she doesn't feel like breakfast. She also craves human attention and I can tell she gets plenty of pets and love from the staff!  Gouda and I highly recommend!
